channel.title: validation on Savo's Site
channel.description: Recent content in validation on Savo's Site

item.title: Force Feedback Tester
item.description: Expanded on my basic, single-axis, force feedback system to now monitor and control up to six axes and eased user configuration

item.title: Kneeload Tester
item.description: Implemented a system to allow a legacy (pre-2000) welding robot to receive force feedback from a modern computer.
